title: American Airlines, DFW Airport plan $4B terminal
content: DFW Airport's sixth terminal will be almost double its originally planned size and will have only American Airlines flights, the airport announced Thursday. to Terminal F. The initial design had 15 gates and would have required travelers to check in at Terminal E, then take the Skylink What's next: The first phase of Terminal F is scheduled to open in 2027. The terminal should be fully operational by 2030.
